# NSAttributedString.TextHighlightStyle

**Structure**

Constants that specify the type of highlight to apply to text.

## Declaration

```swift
struct TextHighlightStyle
```

## Overview

Use an [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSAttributedString/TextHighlightStyle] structure as the value of the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSAttributedString/Key/textHighlightStyle] attribute. That attribute applies a highlight to the text to emphasize it. The highlight contributes a background color and a contrasting foreground color to the text.

## Getting the highlight styles

- **default**: The default highlight style to apply to text.

## Creating a highlight style

- **init(_:)**
- **init(rawValue:)**

## Getting text content attributes

- **NSAttributedString.Key**: The attributes you apply to ranges of characters in an attributed string.
- **NSAttributedString.TextHighlightColorScheme**: Constants that specify the highlight color to use with the text.
- **NSAttributedString.TextEffectStyle**: Constants for the type of effect to apply to the text.
- **NSAttributedString.SpellingState**: Constants for the spelling state attribute key.
- **NSUnderlineStyle**: Constants for the underline style and strikethrough style attribute keys.
- **NSWritingDirectionFormatType**: Constants for the writing direction attribute key.

## Conforms To

- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
